attributes.action: Defy the EU and increase border controls of the United Kingdom with aims to reduce benefit tourism
attributes.additional_details: Make the government look at immediately defying EU directives and treaties to gain control of our borders and severely reduce the number of unskilled immigrants that can come and take advantage of the fragile British economy. The aim of this E-Petition is to immediately gain Increased control over who comes Into our country and the effect that has on public services
